mapper.select: select a.group_invite_sn, a.group_sn, a.group_invite_de, a.group_invite_sttus, a.mber_sn, b.group_nm, b.group_job_type_code, (select count(*) from group_member where group_sn = a.group_sn) as group_count, (select g.mber_ncnm from group_hub d , group_member f ,member g where d.group_sn = f.group_sn and f.mber_sn = g.mber_sn and f.group_mbr_role_code = 0 and a.group_sn = d.group_sn ) as group_chief from group_invite a, group_hub b , member c where a.group_sn = b.group_sn and a.mber_sn = c.mber_sn and a.group_invite_sttus=0 and a.mber_sn = #{mber_sn} order by group_invite_sn
mapper.update: update group_invite set group_invite_res_de=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'), group_invite_sttus=#{group_invite_sttus} where group_invite_sn=#{group_invite_sn}
mapper.select: select group_sn, mber_sn from group_invite where group_invite_sn = #{group_invite_sn}
mapper.insert: insert into group_member (GROUP_MEMBER_NO, GROUP_SN, MBER_SN, GROUP_MBR_ROLE_CODE, GROUP_MBR_STTUS_CODE) values (groupmember_seq.nextval, #{group_sn}, #{mber_sn}, 1, 1)
